member.name: T:MixLibrary.MixClass
member.summary: Actions to save and load MIX packages.

member.summary: Load MIX package from a remote host.

member.summary: Load MIX package from a directory.
member.param: Ignore integrity checks when parsing file datas.
member.returns: MIX Package loaded from specified location.

member.name: M:MixLibrary.MixClass.Load(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Load MIX package from a stream.

member.name: M:MixLibrary.MixClass.Load(System.Byte[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Load MIX package from array of bytes.
member.param: Byte array containing the bytes of a MIX package.
Ignore integrity checks when parsing file datas.
member.returns: MIX Package loaded from byte array.

member.returns: MIX Package data as array of bytes.
